#create data frame for problem 1

```{r HW1 Problem1}
library(tidyverse)

set.seed(2)

p8105_hw1_df = tibble(
  random_var = rnorm(8),
  vec_logical = c(random_var>0),
  vec_char = c("A","character","variable","that","is", "eight","in", "length"),
  vec_factor = factor(c("Low","Low","Low", "Med","Med","High", "High","High"))
)
```

#Taking the mean of the sample

```{r}
mean(random_var)
```
